# EJ196-240102 Chiller Equipment Maintenance Contract

## Official Government Tender Announcement

### Reference and Details
* Reference Number: WS4228292986-Doc4431882524
* Solicitation Number: WS4228292986
* Publication Date: 2024-02-15
* Tender Closing Date: 2024-02-23T14:00:00 (Closed)
* Amendment Date: 2024-02-23

### Contract Details
* Contract Title: Chiller Equipment Maintenance Contract
* Contract Location: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* Contracting Authority: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2024-05-01
* Expected Contract End Date: N/A

### Notice Type and Procurement Method
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding

### Contract Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking a contractor to provide maintenance services on Centrifugal Chiller equipment at 3545 Leitrim Road, Ottawa, Ontario. The contractor will be responsible for maintaining and repairing the chiller equipment in accordance with the Statement of Work.

### Mandatory Requirements
* Security clearance is required for this contract.
* A mandatory site visit will be held on February 28, 2024 at 10:00 AM EST. Bidders must confirm attendance with the Contracting Authority by February 21, 2024 at 14:00 EST.
* Electronic devices, such as cellular phones, are not allowed on site.

### Contact Information
* Contact Name: Samantha Dupuis (SPAC/PSPC)
* Contact Email: [samantha.dupuis@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:samantha.dupuis@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* For bidder inquiries, please contact Samantha Dupuis.

### Trade Agreements
This tender is subject to the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), and other applicable trade agreements.
